data.definition: A fried square French donut coated with powdered sugar.
Bright light used to blind prey while hunting.

data.defintion: Mudbug – Crustacean served boiled or fried.

data.definition: African word for okra, which is used as a thickening agent in a dark stew of seafood or meat, served over rice.

data.definiton: Well-seasoned mixture of rice, meat and vegetables cooked in one pot.

data.defintion: A political division resembling counties in other states. Louisiana is the only state with parishes (dating back to Napoleon and a strong Catholic influence).
A classic Cajun concoction made by blending oil and flour and cooking them together. Used in Cajun Gumbo, stews, fricassees, etc.
Small boat for crabbing or shrimping.
Strips of spiced pork or beef which are smoked like jerky and used to flavor many dishes; a sort of Cajun pepperoni.
means spicy sauce; is a spicy stew.
The sweetest of sweets, this is a candy patty made of sugar, cream and pecans.
A cornbread-type of mixture, formed into balls and fried until crispy on the outside.
People of mixed French, Spanish, Indian or Negro blood.
A sandwich made on French bread that began as an affordable lunch for poor boys.
